name: Creation Cycle Project: Human
description:
PLEASE PLAY IN FULL VIEW!!

A human's existence seems to be really fragile and it can shatter like crystal at any given chance. Despite this, they keep on trying to live everyday.

Creation Cycle Project: Human is about someone somewhere in a place they don't know, or do they?

It features several characters who might or might not give you the answers you're looking for, and several situations that will test your abilities to trust in your feelings and the forces that seem to manipulate you.

It's a beginning of something much larger.

If you want to see the game warnings, click here (contains mild spoilers).

  • If you get a game over, don't restart the game! Your progress doesn't stop if you lose!

If you happen to find a bug or an error, shoot me an ask.

Textadventures mirror
